168b1(nyi khri): pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa drug po dag go/ de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa
168b2(nyi khri): sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba/
168b3(nyi khri): dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang
168b4(nyi khri): ga ste/ dbang bcu po de dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag
168b5(nyi khri): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la yang dag pa ji ltar ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i las dang la
168b6(nyi khri): yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab mkhyen to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gyi 'ji
168b7(nyi khri): rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
168b8(nyi khri): mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang
169a1(nyi khri): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
169a2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par byang ba dgod par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du ma sngon gyi gnas
169a3(nyi khri): rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi ba
169a4(nyi khri): yang rjes su dgongs so// skal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / skal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa
169a5(nyi khri): brgya stong du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs ste/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to//
169a6(nyi khri): rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhe bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di za za'o// yun 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/
169a7(nyi khri): bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/ che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas sa mal dang bcas/
169a8(nyi khri): tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so// lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs
169b1(nyi khri): so// kha dog sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / bde' 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'dong ba'i
169b2(nyi khri): sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/
169b3(nyi khri): log par lta ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/ ngan song log par ltung sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/
169b4(nyi khri): ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis
169b5(nyi khri): lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o// zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par
169b6(nyi khri): grol ba/ zag pa med pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
169b7(nyi khri): pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ 'di la chos mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam
169b8(nyi khri): bram ze 'am/ lha'i 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag
170a1(nyi khri): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod
170a2(nyi khri): de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra skrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud
170a3(nyi khri): dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la
170a4(nyi khri): zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to// zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su
170a5(nyi khri): yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de dag la bdag
170a6(nyi khri): bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i
170a7(nyi khri): sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor
170a8(nyi khri): bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/
170b1(nyi khri): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par
170b2(nyi khri): rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu
170b3(nyi khri): mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bce'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/
170b4(nyi khri): tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis yang dag par bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtog
170b5(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba de/ byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i bstan par de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba ri mi 'byung ngo zhes
170b6(nyi khri): dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshigs su'ang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// shes bya
170b7(nyi khri): ba'i rgyu re yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba 'thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob
170b8(nyi khri): par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam/
171a1(nyi khri): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor ba'i mi nus pa// bdag gis rab tu bsko
171a2(nyi khri): bar bya'o// zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang
171a3(nyi khri): dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang
171a4(nyi khri): zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / de spo bas pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba
171a5(nyi khri): med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas//
171a6(nyi khri): la las shes su 'ong ba zhes gang yang bcas par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi skye
171a7(nyi khri): pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcas par dgongs
171a8(nyi khri): pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin shegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin ga
171b1(nyi khri): pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes pa 'ong ngo zhes bcad par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ba ste/ 'di ni bsrung
171b2(nyi khri): ba med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la ni rna ba btung
171b3(nyi khri): de rim gror nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/
171b4(nyi khri): thugs yang med por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med
171b5(nyi khri): pa dang / chos dang gnyen pa'i chos la nan tan du mi byed pa na yang / des de bzhin gshegs pa thugs khros par mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches
171b6(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la las rna btung de rim gror nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer
171b7(nyi khri): ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la las rna ba btud de/ rim gror mi nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan
171b8(nyi khri): mi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa 'am/ thugs khros pa gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhi/ mkhyen par btang snyoms su
172a1(nyi khri): rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bco
172a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa las dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la
172a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin
172a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ba ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
172a5(nyi khri): pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brda' nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir/ mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste dngos su na/ sangs
172a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin
172a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// ca co mi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs
172a8(nyi khri): mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'/ brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//
172b1(nyi khri): pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi ma'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i
172b2(nyi khri): shes gzigs yongs su nyis pa mi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du
172b3(nyi khri): 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye
172b4(nyi khri): gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de ga ni
172b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba zhi ba'i rnam pa dang
172b6(nyi khri): ldan pa'i mtshan nyid na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// / bam po//
172b7(nyi khri): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang // zhabs gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel
172b8(nyi khri): pa dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jus pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho' ba dang /
173a1(nyi khri): phrag pa'i spyan mdzes par grub pa dang /
173a2(nyi khri): yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag bla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang /
173a3(nyi khri): gser gyi mdog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / sku re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / prag so shin tu
173a4(nyi khri): rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing nya gro nga ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu'i skye gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng
173a5(nyi khri): 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems shin tu mnyam pa ba dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag
173a6(nyi khri): 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams
173a7(nyi khri): cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am/ ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis
173a8(nyi khri): mnyam par sa la 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa med pas/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs
173a9(nyi khri): dra bas 'brel pa'o// shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pa dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang 'gur gyi lhan shin tu mtho bas
173b1(nyi khri): bdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas/ sor mo ring ba'o// rting pa yangs pas/ rting pa yang ba'o// sku legs par mdun du 'phags la drang zla sku
173b2(nyi khri): che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha nga dang / long bu mdzes par nub pas/ zhabs legs par mthong ba'o// spu gyen tu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyi
173b3(nyi khri): ba'o// ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa dang / smig mdar ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la/ rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas/ ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o//
173b4(nyi khri): brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang / rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas
173b5(nyi khri): shing tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas/ gser gi kha dog go// gser dang
173b6(nyi khri): dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/ sku la rdul mi gos pas/ mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i skya re res skyes shing
173b7(nyi khri): gnyis su med pas sku re re nas g.yas su 'okhyol ba'o// me tog kun 'da' dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la nyi ma zla ba brgya pas kyang 'phags pa
173b8(nyi khri): 'od 'phags pa'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu rgyas pas/ zhal mdzod skus brgyan pa'o// ro steng che bas seng ge'i stod do/ 'gur dang / rgyud legs par 'brel cing
174a1(nyi khri): lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par 'grub pa'o// gser gyi brtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas/ phrag so shin//
174a2(nyi khri): tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang / 'khris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams shing / rnam par 'grib pa med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go// sku che zhing 'dom du mnyam pas/
174a3(nyi khri): shing nya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// skye gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i dbu'i mnyam zhing / legs par grub la mnga' bas/ dbu'i spyi gtsug
174a4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing / shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang / bya ka la bying ka lta bu'i gsung
174a5(nyi khri): mngalas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me lod kyi dkyil 'khor legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o//
174a6(nyi khri): me tog kun 'da' dang / dung gi bcag 'gro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba'o// choms mthon man med pas tshems mnyam pa'o//
174a7(nyi khri): tshems la 'tshams ma 'dod pas/ tshems thags bzang ba'o// tha rog dge dgu med pas/ tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu cing ba'o// dkar nag gi cham 'dres la shin tu
174a8(nyi khri): rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma yog pas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas/ ba'i rdzi lta bu'o//
174b1(nyi khri): de la bla ma la bsu bskyel dang / chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten la sogs pa bsti bstang byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor/
174b2(nyi khri): mo'i mtshan mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i lnga ltas so// yid dam la brtan pas/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan
174b3(nyi khri): pa'i snga ltas so// sbyin pa dang / snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ste/ de ni
174b4(nyi khri): myur du 'dra ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang / bca' dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams bde ba byin pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba
174b5(nyi khri): ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa dkrol zhing / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog
174b6(nyi khri): gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang / ting pa yangs pa dang / su che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// de ni dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang //
174b7(nyi khri): bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gyi sku gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltaso// /
174b8(nyi khri): rig pa dang / bzo'i las rim 'gror byas shing / gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas/ ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so// mdog
175a1(nyi khri): cing yod pa'i nor la thangs na/ mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces pa byas pas/ phyag bar drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad mnga' ba dang /
175a2(nyi khri): dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'grogs dang / mdza' bshes dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs
175a3(nyi khri): su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po
175a4(nyi khri): byin pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni stan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po theb pa'i
175a5(nyi khri): snga ltas so// 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la stsogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gre re byas pa dang / btsun
175a6(nyi khri): par byas pa dang / bcol ba rnams rna ba la ma bzan pas/ spu re re nas g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so//
175a7(nyi khri): mi snyan pa mi zer zhing mi spod la/ sman par smra zhing legs par spyad pa mthun par 'dzin pas/ seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lcen mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni
175a8(nyi khri): thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sran dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gror byas pas zag so shin tu rgyas pa dang /
175b1(nyi khri): bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so// bskyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / 'phreng ba'i gnas dang
175b2(nyi khri): stegs dang / rtsug lag khang bya ba la stsogs pa'i gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu' skyi
175b3(nyi khri): gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring snyan cing 'jam ba dang / nyams bde bar smra bas/ ljags shin tu yangs shing zab pa dang /
175b4(nyi khri): tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yin lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i lnga stes so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing / rnam par
175b5(nyi khri): shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtad mi za zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal
175b6(nyi khri): ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig kyang spangs shing / dus dus su smra bas/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang /
175b7(nyi khri): brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shin tu dka' ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor lnga nas bsags pa'i snga lngas so// yun ring po nas
175b8(nyi khri): nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig sgra smra bas// tshems sunyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so// ping gang 'khyud pa bzhin du bsam
175b9(nyi khri): mas thag bzang ba dang /
176a1(nyi khri): pa med la/ ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis blta blta bas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de
176a2(nyi khri): kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe' byed bzang
176a3(nyi khri): po brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa
176a4(nyi khri): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bas sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdon snum pa yin/
176a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/
176a6(nyi khri): ri mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge
176a7(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tsho
176a8(nyi khri): ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtswa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'brel ba ste/ rtsal mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas
176b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi mnyam pa thams cad
176b2(nyi khri): las sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas
176b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/
176b4(nyi khri): ngang ba'i stabs su bzhugs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
176b5(nyi khri): rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste// g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin//
176b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i
176b7(nyi khri): dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu yang sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyang
176b8(nyi khri): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ skur rim gyis gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku dang gsung
177a1(nyi khri): dang / thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam
177a2(nyi khri): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
177a3(nyi khri): rnams ni/ chos 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe' byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku na
177a4(nyi khri): zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
177a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni/ mchog tu 'dzam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ skra shin tu gzhon tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ rtag zhum pa med pa'i thugs
177a6(nyi khri): banga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bya ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
177a7(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni/ yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag
177a8(nyi khri): dang / sa nyid lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan legs par mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag ste/ snang ba rab
177a9(nyi khri): lag nyid lag
177b1(nyi khri): rib med cing rnam par dag pa yini/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
177b2(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom
177b3(nyi khri): ba ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
177b4(nyi khri): rnam ni/ chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte g.yas
177b5(nyi khri): phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
177b6(nyi khri): rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos
177b7(nyi khri): dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shing bal ltar rab tu yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing
177b8(nyi khri): bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo bal la byams bres dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi sor mo
178a1(nyi khri): snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi sor mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas
178a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bslab pa'i gnas ha cang
178a3(nyi khri): mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bkye ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs pa
178a4(nyi khri): snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jam pa sngon tu btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin du 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/
178a5(nyi khri): yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byin pa so so'i skye ba 'dod chags pa rnams kyis/ chos dang
178a6(nyi khri): 'dul ba ting dpag dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang / 'byug gi sgra lta bus/ bsnyengs pa mi
178a7(nyi khri): mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bas spa
178a8(nyi khri): ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams sra bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ srid pa kun tun tu sbyor ba las
178b1(nyi khri): 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ skye ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom
178b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sa'i phyogs mnyam pa na bzhags
178b3(nyi khri): pa ste/ mche' ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos stogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche
178b4(nyi khri): ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shes rab kyi ri mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bco
178b5(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni/ 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos phul tu yangs pa mang
178b6(nyi khri): ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
178b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang /
178b8(nyi khri): na chung mchog gi mig ltar dka' nag dbyes shing / pad ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ sprin
179a1(nyi khri): mi ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ srin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin//
179a2(nyi khri): ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i sku mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum
179a3(nyi khri): gyis sems can snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ sprin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang
179a4(nyi khri): ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa
179a5(nyi khri): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po mnyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
179a6(nyi khri): rnams ni/ lta ba'i rnam par thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phra ba dang legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ phas kyi rgol ba/
179a7(nyi khri): shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ smon lam dam pa shin tu gas pa ste/ dbu' shin tu rgyas pa yin
179a8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yul gyi brang ba rnam par bzog pa ste/ dbu' brang ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong
179b1(nyi khri): ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa/
179b2(nyi khri): ste/ dbu' 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu mkhrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu' mi 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
179b3(nyi khri): ni/ brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu'i me rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun/
179b4(nyi khri): par bsgrub pa ste/ dbu' dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ phyag dang zhabs kyi dpal gyi bye'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba'i 'khyil pas brgyan
179b5(nyi khri): pa yin/ rab 'byor de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpera' byad bzang po brgyad bcu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i
179b6(nyi khri): chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na//
179b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179b8(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe
180a1(nyi khri): na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis/ sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin//
180a2(nyi khri): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
180a3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams
180a4(nyi khri): sdud pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems
180a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig bstan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can
180a6(nyi khri): rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don pas/ sems can
180a7(nyi khri): rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor
180a8(nyi khri): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems chen podon bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ rab 'byor de ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rkyen po pa rol
180a9(nyi khri): mas dpa'
180b1(nyi khri): don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rold tu phyin pa drag po de dag gis don
180b2(nyi khri): mthun pas/ sems can rnam sdud do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ dge' ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor
180b3(nyi khri): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams skud do// rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
180b4(nyi khri): rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub
180b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la de skad 'dems shing 'di skad ston to// rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis
180b6(nyi khri): shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin
180b7(nyi khri): thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyi byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyi shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams
180b8(nyi khri): cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgoms shig ces
181a1(nyi khri): chos ston no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la/
181a2(nyi khri): mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la/
181a3(nyi khri): mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ de la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin na ni/ rab 'byor de 'di
181a4(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa dang /
181a5(nyi khri): yi ge la mkhas pa dang / yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba dang yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
181a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i ches te/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thum mong ma yi pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
181a7(nyi khri): 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces sol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung /
181a8(nyi khri): ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem
181b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
181b2(nyi khri): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
181b3(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
181b4(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu dang /
181b5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
181b6(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i
181b7(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs
181b8(nyi khri): so// sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
182a1(nyi khri): pamigs pa su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so//
182a2(nyi khri): sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa rna thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
182a3(nyi khri): dmigs su ma mchis so// dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni/ sems can mchis so// gzugs
182a4(nyi khri): ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
182a5(nyi khri): kyi bar du ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so// mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so// dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu
182a6(nyi khri): ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub
182a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
182a8(nyi khri): no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//
182b1(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid rig par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o// phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong khams stong pa
182b2(nyi khri): nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//
182b3(nyi khri): bdag stong pa nyid rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gsol ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shes can dang /
182b4(nyi khri): shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tsher bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong
182b5(nyi khri): ba po stong pa nyid rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
182b6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
182b7(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
182b8(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
183a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir//
183a2(nyi khri): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong
183a3(nyi khri): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab
183a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur
183a5(nyi khri): pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la mi 'jug de ltar ston to// de de ltar mthong nas/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos
183a6(nyi khri): gang yang 'khrug par mi byed gnyis su mi byed do// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
183a7(nyi khri): pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing / sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
183a8(nyi khri): brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod/ la la bsam gtan bzhi dang / la
183b1(nyi khri): la ni tshad med pa bzhi dang / la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la sbyor/ la la 'phags//
183b2(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / la la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
183b3(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin
183b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / la la byams pa chen po dang / la la snying rje chen po dang / la la
183b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / la la phyir mi 'ong
183b6(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu dang / lha la dgra bcom pa nyid dang / la la rang byang chub la spyod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod
183b7(nyi khri): dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183b8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams yongs su bkrol nas ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du
184a1(nyi khri): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bkod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du
184a2(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs kyi ma bcings ma
184a3(nyi khri): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma
184a4(nyi khri): yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
184a5(nyi khri): 'di ltar gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad
184a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
184a7(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang / sems can du mi migs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la/
184a8(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong
184b1(nyi khri): pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du/ stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
184b2(nyi khri): chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po/
184b3(nyi khri): med pa mi gnas so// rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so// gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
184b4(nyi khri): ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la yang mi gnas so// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184b5(nyi khri): po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid/ thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed do// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
184b6(nyi khri): de ltar spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang
184b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon tu mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /
184b8(nyi khri): byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de rjes su rtogs te/ de ni 'di ltar sangs
185a1(nyi khri): chos nyid de'i rjes su rtogs nas kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir/
185a2(nyi khri): zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da'
185a3(nyi khri): ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol
185a4(nyi khri): to// bcom ldan 'das te de ltar chos kyis dbyings la yang 'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis na/ ci lags 'on
185a5(nyi khri): gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhon/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
185a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
185a7(nyi khri): yang gzhan zhig lags so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin ched kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
185a8(nyi khri): mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
185b1(nyi khri): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang /
185b2(nyi khri): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan
185b3(nyi khri): la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
185b4(nyi khri): gal te gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
185b5(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams
185b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams
185b7(nyi khri): kyi 'bras bu rnam par bkod cing / nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa/ nag po'i sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten/
185b8(nyi khri): dkar po'i chos rnam par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi dkar nad kyis rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/ mi gnas
186a1(nyi khri): cing dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing dkar ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
186a2(nyi khri): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/
186a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden pa ni/ 'bras bu rnam
186a4(nyi khri): par dgod par bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni/ rnam par brtag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ tha snyad med pa ste/ 'di ltar ming bden pa dang /
186a5(nyi khri): gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
186a6(nyi khri): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi
186a7(nyi khri): don dam pa'i bden pa ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
186a8(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
186b1(nyi khri): 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni des kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan
186b2(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par
186b3(nyi khri): dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/ lAm+ba pra sgom pa yang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta
186b4(nyi khri): rnarnam par rgod pa
186b5(nyi khri): ga la 'ong / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod/ lam bsgom pa yang yod pas na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la bu 'bras bu rnam par
186b6(nyi khri): dgod pa yod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam bsgom pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das
186b7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bya ba med de/ rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras
186b8(nyi khri): bya thob pa med do// lam gyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba yang med do// lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
186b9(nyi khri): dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod par byed de/ 'dus byas kyi las dang /
187a1(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing / 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa mi byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal de/ de ltar 'dus
187a2(nyi khri): byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing / 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas//
187a3(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gyis kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs
187a4(nyi khri): pas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i cha can gyis kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag
187a5(nyi khri): thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas/ rang byang chub dong / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
187a6(nyi khri): chub po zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsung
187a7(nyi khri): pa'i don de ji ltar bdag gis 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
187a8(nyi khri): 'bras pa'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te/
187b1(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
187b2(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
187b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med
187b4(nyi khri): par mtshan nyid gcig du chud par gyur na de'i tshe/ 'dus byas zhe 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes chos gang la yang ris su bcod pa yod daM/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
187b5(nyi khri): 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187b6(nyi khri): byin pa la sbyor ba'i/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris bcad pas/ chos mi ston te/
187b7(nyi khri): de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson bgrus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
187b8(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ khams gtan po'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsapa gtan gsum pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am
188a1(nyi khri): byams pa 'am/ snying rje 'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam shes mtha'/
188a2(nyi khri): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
188a3(nyi khri): 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi
188a4(nyi khri): yan lag rnams sam/ lam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
188a5(nyi khri): sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
188a6(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams so/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so nga
188a7(nyi khri): dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mar/
188a8(nyi khri): chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ gang la yang chags pa med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa/
188b1(nyi khri): yongs su gtong yang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan de na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bkra
188b2(nyi khri): ba'i don tu sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
188b3(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / zag dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
188b4(nyi khri): 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bsgom yang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang /
188b5(nyi khri): 'dus byas kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams
188b6(nyi khri): bsgom mo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la yang
188b7(nyi khri): gnas pa 'am/ chags pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni shin tu khong du chud do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
188b8(nyi khri): phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste// drug bcu gnyis pa'o// /
189a1(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
189a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sprul pa ni/ 'dod chags
189a3(nyi khri): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do// bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su sbyang
189a4(nyi khri): pa med pa med do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs
189a5(nyi khri): sra spyod pa med do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyad pa med do// skye mched
189a6(nyi khri): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs su spyod med do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
189a7(nyi khri): sum bcu rtsa bdun la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
189a8(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
189b1(nyi khri): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
189b2(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
189b3(nyi khri): la yongs su yongs spyod pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
189b4(nyi khri): yang / chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams kyi chos mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no//
189b5(nyi khri): bam po// // gsol pa/
189b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das sprul pas/ lam bsgom pa la brten kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang
189b7(nyi khri): mi gda' na/ lam bsgom du ci mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig
189b8(nyi khri): la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'byung ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/
190a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcos nas ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/
190a2(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom
190a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid tshul la rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/
190a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzubs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags
190a5(nyi khri): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams
190a6(nyi khri): cad ni sprul pa lta bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ltar gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
190a7(nyi khri): pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis/ tsher ba dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa
190a8(nyi khri): ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma michis na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur
190b1(nyi khri): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//
190b2(nyi khri): sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am/ mi dag las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol
190b3(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos/ khams gsum
190b4(nyi khri): nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lnga
190b5(nyi khri): bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan las gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags//
190b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang //
190b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub kyi bgyi lam la spyod pa lags//
190b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems
190b9(nyi khri): # / gang
191a1(nyi khri): can rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po sems can rnams kyi don tu bskal
191a2(nyi khri): pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod do// rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub
191a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
191a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mig sor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
191a5(nyi khri): sems can rnams ci la gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams gyen du bskyod par bgyid//
191a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni/ ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems
191a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du bskyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags//
191a8(nyi khri): mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur du ming bi spros btags pa'o//
191b1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par
191b2(nyi khri): shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya 'am/ byol song
191b3(nyi khri): gi skye gnas shes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba'am/ mi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes
191b4(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras su
191b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni/ sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/
191b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor ming thams ni ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i tu byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste de dag la byang chub sems
191b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mkhas pas ming thams cani yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pas
191b8(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed cig chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni/ mngon par zhes par mi byed do zhes skur
192a1(nyi khri): bar byed de// rang byor de ldan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa
192a2(nyi khri): sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshan nam gang zhe na/ gnyis pa 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan
192a3(nyi khri): ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang /
192a4(nyi khri): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa dang / 'phra ba dang / bzang ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad
192a5(nyi khri): cig la kun tu rtog pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang
192a6(nyi khri): la yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su rtags shing / nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub
192a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhi/ mtshan ma med pa'i
192a8(nyi khri): dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan pa'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing bzhon pa
192b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams
192b2(nyi khri): ma de dag las rnam par dkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'brod do// gsol pa/ gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas ste/ ming dang
192b3(nyi khri): mtshan mar bas la/ btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su bstags pa las 'byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/
192b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge
192b5(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
192b6(nyi khri): 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
192b7(nyi khri): che/ khyad par 'thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la/ sbyor ba'i mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang med/ dngos po med pa
192b8(nyi khri): mtshan ma yang med pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
193a1(nyi khri): gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
193a2(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
193a3(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ dran pa nye
193a4(nyi khri): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags/
193a5(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma sbed pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid dang / phyir stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa 'i yongs rdzogs pa
193a6(nyi khri): par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar
193a7(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang / sar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
193a8(nyi khri): smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs
193b1(nyi khri): da ri'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par nus/
193b2(nyi khri): su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag rigs par bzhi dang /
193b3(nyi khri): sa bcan pa / can pa dang 'as pa sa su ngangazad par tshul gyig/
193b4(nyi khri): dag dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na/ skra'i rtse mo'i tsha shes bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa'
193b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'a
193b6(nyi khri): rgya bar mi nus te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni
193b7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med ga rgyu yid la bya ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
193b8(nyi khri): tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma mchis
193b9(nyi khri): shing dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i
194a1(nyi khri): chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i
194a2(nyi khri): chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ba'i chos so// 'di dag thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so//
194a3(nyi khri): 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyis so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
194a4(nyi khri): kyi chos so zhes ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi
194a5(nyi khri): chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems mtshan ma
194a6(nyi khri): med pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan
194a7(nyi khri): ma med pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
194a8(nyi khri): rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// 8
194b1(nyi khri): byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags
194b2(nyi khri): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnams grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams
194b3(nyi khri): cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po ni/ dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di lta ste/ rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
194b4(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
194b5(nyi khri): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam ga
194b6(nyi khri): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
194b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
194b8(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
195a1(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
195a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab pa bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do//
195a3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du/ dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid ni stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgor/
195a4(nyi khri): mtshan ma dang bral ba ni/ mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgor ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
195a5(nyi khri): gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob
195a6(nyi khri): pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la thob pa yin/ dngos po med
195a7(nyi khri): ba'i ngo bo nyid stos pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang /
195a8(nyi khri): bo lnga dang / bas lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan
195b1(nyi khri): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
195b2(nyi khri): dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la/ slob
195b3(nyi khri): ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa zhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
195b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
195b5(nyi khri): rnam pa gang gis tshul du/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sla
195b6(nyi khri): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
195b7(nyi khri): gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba yin par rab tu shes so// de ji ltar na
195b8(nyi khri): gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar/ shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu bse tshags dang / shin tu snying po med pa
196a1(nyi khri): rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang //
196a2(nyi khri): nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de/ gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa
196a3(nyi khri): ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag /
196a4(nyi khri): ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'grib pa yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du
196a5(nyi khri): gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/
